title: Dimensional Executioner

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of the game, a random player besides you will become your target. The host will tell you your target through DMs rather than in your private channel.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get your target lynched at any cost. You can win after the game ends.

desc:
Post 3408
*What do you mean? Of course I don't hold grudges.*
